columns.name: cuc_id
columns.comment: Primary key

columns.name: cuc_namespace
columns.comment: When pages are renamed, their RC entries do _not_ change.

columns.name: cuc_page_id
columns.comment: Key to page_id (was cur_id prior to 1.5). This will keep links working after moves while retaining the at-the-time name in the changes list.

columns.name: cuc_this_oldid
columns.comment: rev_id of the given revision

columns.name: cuc_last_oldid
columns.comment: rev_id of the prior revision, for generating diff links.

columns.name: cuc_type
columns.comment: RecentChange type identifiers: RC_EDIT, RC_NEW or RC_LOG

columns.name: cuc_timestamp
columns.comment: Event timestamp

columns.name: cuc_ip
columns.comment: IP address, visible

columns.name: cuc_ip_hex
columns.comment: IP address as hexidecimal

columns.name: cuc_xff
columns.comment: XFF header, visible, all data

columns.name: cuc_xff_hex
columns.comment: XFF header, last IP, as hexidecimal

columns.name: cuc_agent
columns.comment: User agent

columns.name: cuc_agent_id
columns.comment: Foreign key to cu_useragent table on the cuua_id field. Represents the user agent string used for this change.

name: cu_log_event
comment: Table for log events that have an associated log ID in the logging table.

columns.name: cule_id
columns.comment: Primary key

columns.name: cule_log_id
columns.comment: The log_id to the logging table entry associated with the current entry.

columns.name: cule_actor
columns.comment: Actor ID. Same as the actor ID in the associated logging row. Included here for indexing purposes.

columns.name: cule_timestamp
columns.comment: Event timestamp. Same as the timestamp in the associated logging row. Included here for indexing purposes.

columns.name: cule_ip
columns.comment: IP address, visible

columns.name: cule_ip_hex
columns.comment: IP address as hexadecimal

columns.name: cule_xff
columns.comment: XFF header, visible, all data

columns.name: cule_xff_hex
columns.comment: XFF header, last IP, as hexadecimal

columns.name: cule_agent
columns.comment: User agent

columns.name: cule_agent_id
columns.comment: Foreign key to cu_useragent table on the cuua_id field. Represents the user agent string used for this log event.

name: cu_private_event
comment: Table for events that are not logged in the logging table, and thus do not have a log ID (such as logins).

columns.name: cupe_id
columns.comment: Primary key

columns.name: cupe_namespace
columns.comment: Key to the namespace of the page affected

columns.name: cupe_log_type
columns.comment: Very similar to logging table's log_type.

columns.name: cupe_log_action
columns.comment: Very similar to logging table's log_action.

columns.name: cupe_params
columns.comment: Very similar to logging table's log_params. LF separated list (old system) or serialized PHP array (new system).

columns.name: cupe_comment_id
columns.comment: Very similar to logging table's log_comment_id. References a comment ID in the comment table.

columns.name: cupe_page
columns.comment: Key to page_id.

columns.name: cupe_timestamp
columns.comment: Event timestamp

columns.name: cupe_ip
columns.comment: IP address, visible

columns.name: cupe_ip_hex
columns.comment: IP address as hexadecimal

columns.name: cupe_xff
columns.comment: XFF header, visible, all data

columns.name: cupe_xff_hex
columns.comment: XFF header, last IP, as hexadecimal

columns.name: cupe_agent
columns.comment: User agent

columns.name: cupe_agent_id
columns.comment: Foreign key to cu_useragent table on the cuua_id field. Represents the user agent string used for this log event.

columns.name: cupe_private
columns.comment: Private Data

name: cu_useragent
comment: The user agent string header provided by the browser for requests is stored here for de-duplication. There MAY be rows with the same user agent string.

columns.name: cuua_id
columns.comment: Unique ID to identify each user agent

columns.name: cuua_text
columns.comment: The user agent string

indexes.name: cuua_text
indexes.comment: Used to find rows with a given user agent string when attempting to insert a new row to one of cu_changes, cu_log_event, cu_private_event, or cu_private_event_no_actor.

columns.name: uach_id
columns.comment: Primary key

columns.name: uach_name
columns.comment: Name of the user-agent client hint. See https://wicg.github.io/ua-client-hints/#http-ua-hints for a list.

columns.name: uach_value
columns.comment: Value of the user-agent client hint, see https://wicg.github.io/ua-client-hints/#http-ua-hints for a list of client hint names.

columns.name: uachm_uach_id
columns.comment: Foreign key to cu_useragent_clienthints uach_id.

columns.name: uachm_reference_id
columns.comment: Foreign key to one of cu_changes, cu_log_event, or cu_private_event. Consult uachm_reference_type to determine which table this row relates to.

columns.name: uachm_reference_type
columns.comment: Integer mapping identifier specifying which table the data in this row relates to. See UserAgentClientHintsManager for the mapping.

columns.name: cul_id
columns.comment: Unique identifier

columns.name: cul_timestamp
columns.comment: Timestamp of CheckUser action

columns.name: cul_actor
columns.comment: User who performed the action

columns.name: cul_reason_id
columns.comment: Reason for the check stored as a comment_id.

columns.name: cul_reason_plaintext_id
columns.comment: Reason for the check with wikitext removed stored as a comment_id.

columns.name: cul_result_id
columns.comment: Comment summarising the result of the check associated with this log entry.

columns.name: cul_result_plaintext_id
columns.comment: Plaintext version of the comment summarising the result of the check associated with this log entry.

columns.name: cul_type
columns.comment: String indicating the type of query, may be: 'useredits', 'userips', 'ipedits', 'ipusers', 'ipedits-xff', 'ipusers-xff' or 'investigate' if the check was performed from Special:Investigate

columns.name: cul_target_id
columns.comment: Integer target, interpretation depends on cul_type For username targets, this is the user_id

columns.name: cul_target_text
columns.comment: Text target, interpretation depends on cul_type

columns.name: cul_target_hex
columns.comment: If the target was an IP address, this contains the hexadecimal form of the IP

columns.name: cul_range_start
columns.comment: If the target was an IP range, this field contain the start, in hex form

columns.name: cul_range_end
columns.comment: If the target was an IP range, this field contain the end, in hex form
